definition: to report the loss of something

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: But she found material were missing in a newspaper report the loss of STH proof.
sentences.chinese: 可她发现资料里少了一份登报挂失证明。

sentences.english: I’d like to report the loss of my credit card and cancel it。

sentences.english: Visible Certificates are registered and the holders of these can report any loss directly to the bank.

sentences.english: Information on stolen or lost passports is also being incorporated into these databases.
sentences.chinese: 这些资料库也储存着挂失护照和被盗护照的信息。

sentences.english: Application for reporting the loss of the hypothecated deposit certificate shall be made in written form.
sentences.chinese: 质押存单的挂失申请应采用书面形式。

sentences.chinese: 我要办理借记卡挂失并停止那张卡。

sentences.english: Did you repor the loss to the bank?
Report this to this office in case of the loss of the meal card.

sentences.english: You may also report the temporary loss by using our telephone banking service.

definition: to replace a lost or damaged SIM card, retaining one's original telephone number/SIM replacement
report the loss to the authorities concerned
record entry (e.g. into a bank passbook)
to unbind (e.g. a phone number from an account)
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
to withdraw money from a bank
